ygData.subject: Re: Bard shop in Erudin?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is not completely useless.  There s been some discussion on the monk mailing list regarding some of the quest items they need to get their
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 3 Jun 1999, John Robertson wrote:
>
> just give it away?) the real question is, why bother to buy this song, since
> it is currently completely useless. :(

It is not completely useless. There's been some discussion on
the monk mailing list regarding some of the quest items they
need to get their headbands/sashes. One of the items they're
supposed to get is the Wand of Marnek. It turns out when you
find this item, it's called "a blackened wand." If you use
the identifying song or an identify spell on it, the name
changes to Wand of Marnek.

Besides, the group invisibility song is at the same place.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
